column3: Mr. President, let’s be clear: You can't be an American company only when you want a massive bailout from the American people.
column4: Mr. President, I hope you will join us on this important issue.
column5: Mr. President, stop trying to suppress the American people. You can't be an American company only when you want a massive tax cut.
